Package edu.ncsu.csc216.stp.model.test_plans

Class TestPlan

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.stp.model.test_plans.AbstractTestPlan
edu.ncsu.csc216.stp.model.test_plans.TestPlan
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<TestPlan>
public class TestPlan extends AbstractTestPlan implements Comparable<TestPlan>
This class creates the TestPlan object and provides functionality to add test cases. Extends AbstractTestPlan to hold test cases that belong to a name project.
Author:
Bryan Phillips, Diego Sarria
